welcomeText:
Dear and esteemed guests!
We are delighted to welcome you to our family restaurant 'Dilkash Shirin Taom,' where national and Turkish dishes are prepared!
The family restaurant 'Dilkash Shirin Taom' is a fusion of Turkish and European cuisines.
🌙 Dear compatriots and guests, we invite you to the legendary family restaurant 'Dilkash,' ready to offer you warmth and delicious dishes.
🍽 Our restaurant menu includes over 120 dishes from various nations, over 25 liquid dishes, and more than 30 salads.
✅ We also offer delivery service in our national restaurant network.
📲 Order acceptance time: 9:00 AM - 10:00 PM
☎️ Phone: 97 616 08 88
sendMeContactBot: Send your contact to use the bot
